meanings.definition: The act or process of systematizing.
meanings.sent1: Her systematizations of her daily routine helped her stay organized.
meanings.sent2: The systematizations of the company's filing system made it easier to find documents.
meanings.sent3: His systematizations of his sock drawer were so meticulous, it was almost like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The systematizations of the library's book collection were like pieces of a puzzle coming together.
meanings.sent5: The professor's systematizations of the course material made it much easier to study for the exam.

meanings.sent1: The systematizations of her efforts were evident in the success of the project.
meanings.sent2: The beautiful garden was a perfect systematization of her love for flowers.
meanings.sent3: The systematizations of his closet organization were so impressive, his friends were envious.
meanings.sent4: The systematizations of the data led to a clear understanding of the trends.
meanings.sent5: The systematizations of the recipes in the cookbook made it easy for beginners to follow.
